55 #define CudaSafeCall(err) __cudaSafeCall(err, __FILE__, __LINE__)
56 #define CudaSafeCallNoThrow(err) __cudaSafeCallNoThrow(err, __FILE__, __LINE__)
57 #define CudaCheckError() __cudaCheckError(__FILE__, __LINE__)
58 
59 inline void __cudaSafeCall(cudaError err, const char* file, const int line) {
60 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_CHECK_CUDA_ERROR
61  if (cudaSuccess != err) {
62  std::stringstream ss;
63  ss << "cudaSafeCall() failed at: " << file << ":" << line;
64  std::string what = ss.str();
65  throw thrust::system_error(err, thrust::cuda_category(), what);
66  }
67 #endif
68 }
69 
70 inline void __cudaSafeCallNoThrow(cudaError err, const char* file,
71  const int line) {
72 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_CHECK_CUDA_ERROR
73  if (cudaSuccess != err) {
74  madness::print_error("cudaSafeCallNoThrow() failed at: ", file, ":", line);
75  }
76 #endif
77 }
78 
79 inline void __cudaCheckError(const char* file, const int line) {
80 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_CHECK_CUDA_ERROR
81  cudaError err = cudaGetLastError();
82  if (cudaSuccess != err) {
83  std::stringstream ss;
84  ss << "cudaCheckError() failed at: " << file << ":" << line;
85  std::string what = ss.str();
86  throw thrust::system_error(err, thrust::cuda_category(), what);
87  }
88 #endif
89 }

95 inline std::pair<int, int> mpi_local_rank_size(World& world) {
96  auto host_comm =
97  world.mpi.comm().Split_type(SafeMPI::Intracomm::SHARED_SPLIT_TYPE, 0);
98  return std::make_pair(host_comm.Get_rank(), host_comm.Get_size());
99 }
100 
101 inline int num_cuda_streams() {
102  int num_streams = -1;
103  char* num_stream_char = std::getenv("TA_CUDA_NUM_STREAMS");
105  if (num_stream_char) {
106  num_streams = std::atoi(num_stream_char);
107  } else {
108  num_streams = 3;
109  }
110  return num_streams;
111 }
112 
113 inline int num_cuda_devices() {
114  int num_devices = -1;
115  CudaSafeCall(cudaGetDeviceCount(&num_devices));
116  return num_devices;
117 }
118 
119 inline int current_cuda_device_id(World& world) {
120  int mpi_local_size = -1;
121  int mpi_local_rank = -1;
122  std::tie(mpi_local_rank, mpi_local_size) = mpi_local_rank_size(world);
123 
124  int num_devices = detail::num_cuda_devices();
125 
126  int cuda_device_id = -1;
127  // devices may already be pre-mapped
128  // if mpi_local_size <= num_devices : all ranks are in same resource set, map
129  // round robin
130  if (mpi_local_size <= num_devices) {
131  cuda_device_id = mpi_local_rank % num_devices;
132  } else { // mpi_local_size > num_devices
133  char* cvd_cstr = std::getenv("CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES");
134  if (cvd_cstr) { // CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is set, assume that pre-mapped
135  // make sure that there is only 1 device available here
136  if (num_devices != 1) {
137  throw std::runtime_error(
138  std::string(
139  "CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES environment variable is set, hence using "
140  "the provided device-to-rank mapping; BUT TiledArray found ") +
141  std::to_string(num_devices) +
142  " CUDA devices; only 1 CUDA device / MPI process is supported");
143  }
144  cuda_device_id = 0;
145  } else { // not enough devices + devices are not pre-mapped
146  throw std::runtime_error(
147  std::string("TiledArray found ") + std::to_string(mpi_local_size) +
148  " MPI ranks on a node with " + std::to_string(num_devices) +
149  " CUDA devices; only 1 MPI process / CUDA device model is currently "
150  "supported");
151  }
152  }
153 
154  return cuda_device_id;
155 }
156 
157 inline void CUDART_CB cuda_readyflag_callback(void* userData) {
158  // convert void * to std::atomic<bool>
159  std::atomic<bool>* flag = static_cast<std::atomic<bool>*>(userData);
160  // set the flag to be true
161  flag->store(true);
162 }
163 
164 struct ProbeFlag {
165  ProbeFlag(std::atomic<bool>* f) : flag(f) {}
166 
167  bool operator()() const { return flag->load(); }
168 
169  std::atomic<bool>* flag;
170 };
171 
172 inline void thread_wait_cuda_stream(const cudaStream_t& stream) {
173  std::atomic<bool>* flag = new std::atomic<bool>(false);
174 
175  CudaSafeCall(
176  cudaLaunchHostFunc(stream, detail::cuda_readyflag_callback, flag));
177 
178  detail::ProbeFlag probe(flag);
179 
180  // wait with sleep and do not do work
181  madness::ThreadPool::await(probe, false, true);
182  // madness::ThreadPool::await(probe, true, true);
183 
184  delete flag;
185 }
186 
187 } // namespace detail

189 inline const cudaStream_t*& tls_cudastream_accessor() {
190  static thread_local const cudaStream_t* thread_local_stream_ptr{nullptr};
191  return thread_local_stream_ptr;
192 }
193 
194 inline void synchronize_stream(const cudaStream_t* stream) {
195  tls_cudastream_accessor() = stream;
196 }
197 
204 class cudaEnv {
205  public:
206  ~cudaEnv() {
207  // destroy cuda streams on current device
208  for (auto& stream : cuda_streams_) {
209  CudaSafeCallNoThrow(cudaStreamDestroy(stream));
210  }
211  }
212 
214  cudaEnv(cudaEnv& cuda_global) = delete;
215 
217  cudaEnv operator=(cudaEnv& cuda_global) = delete;
218 
220  static std::unique_ptr<cudaEnv>& instance() {
221  static std::unique_ptr<cudaEnv> instance_{nullptr};
222  if (!instance_) {
223  initialize(instance_, TiledArray::get_default_world());
224  }
225  return instance_;
226  }
227 
229  static void initialize(std::unique_ptr<cudaEnv>& instance, World& world) {
230  // initialize only when not initialized
231  if (instance == nullptr) {
232  int num_streams = detail::num_cuda_streams();
233  int num_devices = detail::num_cuda_devices();
234  int device_id = detail::current_cuda_device_id(world);
235  // set device for current MPI process .. will be set in the ctor as well
236  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(device_id));
237  CudaSafeCall(cudaDeviceSetCacheConfig(cudaFuncCachePreferShared));
238 
239  // uncomment to debug umpire ops
240  //
241  // umpire::util::Logger::getActiveLogger()->setLoggingMsgLevel(
242  // umpire::util::message::Debug);
243 
244  // make Thread Safe UM Dynamic POOL
245 
246  auto& rm = umpire::ResourceManager::getInstance();
247 
248  auto mem_total_free = cudaEnv::memory_total_and_free_device();
249 
250  // turn off Umpire introspection for non-Debug builds
251 #ifndef NDEBUG
252  constexpr auto introspect = true;
253 #else
254  constexpr auto introspect = false;
255 #endif
256 
257  // allocate all free memory for UM pool
258  // subsequent allocs will use 1/10 of the total device memory
259  auto alloc_grain = mem_total_free.second / 10;
260  auto um_dynamic_pool =
261  rm.makeAllocator<umpire::strategy::DynamicPool, introspect>(
262  "UMDynamicPool", rm.getAllocator("UM"), mem_total_free.second,
263  alloc_grain);
264  auto thread_safe_um_dynamic_pool =
265  rm.makeAllocator<umpire::strategy::ThreadSafeAllocator, introspect>(
266  "ThreadSafeUMDynamicPool", um_dynamic_pool);
267 
268  // allocate zero memory for device pool, same grain for subsequent allocs
269  auto dev_size_limited_alloc =
270  rm.makeAllocator<umpire::strategy::SizeLimiter, introspect>(
271  "size_limited_alloc", rm.getAllocator("DEVICE"),
272  mem_total_free.first);
273  auto dev_dynamic_pool =
274  rm.makeAllocator<umpire::strategy::DynamicPool, introspect>(
275  "CUDADynamicPool", dev_size_limited_alloc, 0, alloc_grain);
276  auto thread_safe_dev_dynamic_pool =
277  rm.makeAllocator<umpire::strategy::ThreadSafeAllocator, introspect>(
278  "ThreadSafeCUDADynamicPool", dev_dynamic_pool);
279 
280  auto cuda_env = std::unique_ptr<cudaEnv>(new cudaEnv(
281  world, num_devices, device_id, num_streams,
282  thread_safe_um_dynamic_pool, thread_safe_dev_dynamic_pool));
283  instance = std::move(cuda_env);
284  }
285  }
286 
287  World& world() const { return *world_; }
288 
289  int num_cuda_devices() const { return num_cuda_devices_; }
290 
291  int current_cuda_device_id() const { return current_cuda_device_id_; }
292 
293  int num_cuda_streams() const { return num_cuda_streams_; }
294 
295  bool concurrent_managed_access() const {
296  return cuda_device_concurrent_managed_access_;
297  }
298 
299  size_t stream_id(const cudaStream_t& stream) const {
300  auto it = std::find(cuda_streams_.begin(), cuda_streams_.end(), stream);
301  if (it == cuda_streams_.end()) abort();
302  return it - cuda_streams_.begin();
303  }
304 
306  static std::pair<size_t, size_t> memory_total_and_free_device() {
307  std::pair<size_t, size_t> result;
308  // N.B. cudaMemGetInfo returns {free,total}
309  CudaSafeCall(cudaMemGetInfo(&result.second, &result.first));
310  return result;
311  }
312 
314 
317  std::vector<std::pair<size_t, size_t>> memory_total_and_free() const {
318  auto world_size = world_->size();
319  std::vector<size_t> total_memory(world_size, 0), free_memory(world_size, 0);
320  auto rank = world_->rank();
321  std::tie(total_memory.at(rank), free_memory.at(rank)) =
322  cudaEnv::memory_total_and_free_device();
323  world_->gop.sum(total_memory.data(), total_memory.size());
324  world_->gop.sum(free_memory.data(), free_memory.size());
325  std::vector<std::pair<size_t, size_t>> result(world_size);
326  for (int r = 0; r != world_size; ++r) {
327  result.at(r) = {total_memory.at(r), free_memory.at(r)};
328  }
329  return result;
330  }
331 
332  const cudaStream_t& cuda_stream(std::size_t i) const {
333  return cuda_streams_.at(i);
334  }
335 
336  const cudaStream_t& cuda_stream_h2d() const {
337  return cuda_streams_[num_cuda_streams_];
338  }
339 
340  const cudaStream_t& cuda_stream_d2h() const {
341  return cuda_streams_[num_cuda_streams_ + 1];
342  }
343 
344  umpire::Allocator& um_dynamic_pool() { return um_dynamic_pool_; }
345 
346  umpire::Allocator& device_dynamic_pool() { return device_dynamic_pool_; }
347 
348  protected:
349  cudaEnv(World& world, int num_devices, int device_id, int num_streams,
350  umpire::Allocator um_alloc, umpire::Allocator device_alloc)
351  : world_(&world),
352  um_dynamic_pool_(um_alloc),
353  device_dynamic_pool_(device_alloc),
354  num_cuda_devices_(num_devices),
355  current_cuda_device_id_(device_id),
356  num_cuda_streams_(num_streams) {
357  if (num_devices <= 0) {
358  throw std::runtime_error("No CUDA-Enabled GPUs Found!\n");
359  }
360 
361  // set device for current MPI process
362  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(current_cuda_device_id_));
363 
365  cudaDeviceProp prop;
366  CudaSafeCall(cudaGetDeviceProperties(&prop, device_id));
367  if (!prop.managedMemory) {
368  throw std::runtime_error("CUDA Device doesn't support managedMemory\n");
369  }
370  int concurrent_managed_access;
371  CudaSafeCall(cudaDeviceGetAttribute(&concurrent_managed_access,
372  cudaDevAttrConcurrentManagedAccess,
373  device_id));
374  cuda_device_concurrent_managed_access_ = concurrent_managed_access;
375  if (!cuda_device_concurrent_managed_access_) {
376  std::cout << "\nWarning: CUDA Device doesn't support "
377  "ConcurrentManagedAccess!\n\n";
378  }
379 
380  // creates cuda streams on current device
381  cuda_streams_.resize(num_cuda_streams_ + 2);
382  for (auto& stream : cuda_streams_) {
383  CudaSafeCall(cudaStreamCreateWithFlags(&stream, cudaStreamNonBlocking));
384  }
385  std::cout << "created " << num_cuda_streams_
386  << " CUDA streams + 2 I/O streams" << std::endl;
387  }
388 
389  private:
390  // the world used to initialize this
391  World* world_;
392 
394  umpire::Allocator um_dynamic_pool_;
396  umpire::Allocator device_dynamic_pool_;
397 
398  int num_cuda_devices_;
399  int current_cuda_device_id_;
400  bool cuda_device_concurrent_managed_access_;
401 
402  int num_cuda_streams_;
403  std::vector<cudaStream_t> cuda_streams_;
404 };
405 
406 namespace detail {
407 
408 template <typename Range>
409 const cudaStream_t& get_stream_based_on_range(const Range& range) {
410  // TODO better way to get stream based on the id of tensor
411  auto stream_id = range.offset() % cudaEnv::instance()->num_cuda_streams();
412  auto& stream = cudaEnv::instance()->cuda_stream(stream_id);
413  return stream;
414 }
415 
416 } // namespace detail

418 namespace nvidia {

420 // Color definitions for nvtxcalls
421 enum class argbColor : uint32_t {
422  red = 0xFFFF0000,
423  blue = 0xFF0000FF,
424  green = 0xFF008000,
425  yellow = 0xFFFFFF00,
426  cyan = 0xFF00FFFF,
427  magenta = 0xFFFF00FF,
428  gray = 0xFF808080,
429  purple = 0xFF800080
430 };
431 
435 inline void range_push(const char* range_title, argbColor range_color) {
436  nvtxEventAttributes_t eventAttrib = {0};
437  eventAttrib.version = NVTX_VERSION;
438  eventAttrib.size = NVTX_EVENT_ATTRIB_STRUCT_SIZE;
439  eventAttrib.messageType = NVTX_MESSAGE_TYPE_ASCII;
440  eventAttrib.colorType = NVTX_COLOR_ARGB;
441  eventAttrib.color = static_cast<uint32_t>(range_color);
442  eventAttrib.message.ascii = range_title;
443  nvtxRangePushEx(&eventAttrib);
444 }
445 
447 inline void range_pop() { nvtxRangePop(); }
448
